name: Roll a Die
description:
You are dead! Yes, that's sad, but you have a chance to turn back to life.  But a life can't be spared without first please the Death with other deaths. 

You have a deal: play Death's game, try to survive the Death Dungeon but die! Death will play with you rolling a dice, well rolling a Die, to choose the way you must die to satisfy his thirst. Everytime you die by the will of Death you come back with an award, in Death words "you get AwarDead for your dead", a step back to life and a step forward to damnation.

This roguelike game has been created for Weekly Game Jam 130: "Dead is Awarded"

Instructions

Move: ASDW / Left Analog Stick

Shoot: Arrow Keys / Right Analog Stick

Start/Continue: Space Key
